ygData.subject: Re: Wizard Poll
ygData.msgSnippet: You may be great in piercing and i commend you; however, there you will give up your dagger (snakefang) when you find a 2H blunt staff such as the Runed Totem
ygData.messageBody:
You may be great in piercing and i commend you; however, there you will give
up your dagger (snakefang) when you find a 2H blunt staff such as the Runed
Totem and the Observers Staff, to mention two. Both of those staffs are far
superior two your piercing abilities. Don't neglect your 2H Blunt training
:).

Ves

-----Original Message-----
From: Elminstr95@... [mailto:Elminstr95@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 9:26 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Wizard Poll


From: Elminstr95@...

Im a level 13 mage and i have tried both blunt and piercing...I have 50 in
piercing and about 32 or so in 2Hblunt...with the piercing i attack twice as

fast and do the same damage..
